dcterms:description: A large-scale video dataset for action recognition and temporal action detection tasks, containing 10K training, 5K validation, and 5K testing videos with 200 action categories.

dcterms:description: A challenging dataset for action recognition with a large number of classes, providing frame-wise action annotations for untrimmed videos.
dcterms:title: THUMOS14
